import axios from'axios';// 创建axios实例
const localBase='http://localhost:9090';const tunnelBase='https://hjzdm-back-3jz-20260109.loca.lt';const getApiBaseUrl=()=>{const hostname=window.location.hostname;if(hostname==='localhost'||hostname==='127.0.0.1'){return localBase;}return tunnelBase;};const apiBaseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||getApiBaseUrl();const apiClient=axios.create({baseURL:apiBaseUrl,timeout:10000,headers:{'Bypass-Tunnel-Reminder':'true'}});const fallbackClient=axios.create({baseURL:apiBaseUrl===localBase?tunnelBase:localBase,timeout:10000,headers:{'Bypass-Tunnel-Reminder':'true'}});// 请求拦截器
apiClient.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization=token;}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});// 响应拦截器
apiClient.interceptors.response.use(response=>{return response;},error=>{var _error$response;const config=(error===null||error===void 0?void 0:error.config)||{};const status=error===null||error===void 0?void 0:(_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.status;const message=(error===null||error===void 0?void 0:error.message)||'';const shouldFallback=!config.__isRetry&&(status===503||status===502||status===0||message.includes('Network Error')||message.includes('Tunnel Unavailable'));if(shouldFallback){config.__isRetry=true;const method=(config.method||'get').toLowerCase();const url=config.url||'';const data=config.data;const headers=config.headers||{};return fallbackClient.request({method,url,data,headers});}console.error('API Error:',error);return Promise.reject(error);});// API接口定义
export const goodsApi={// 搜索商品
searchGoods:(query,attrFilters,catId)=>{return apiClient.post('/goods/search',{query,attrFilters,catId});},// 比价搜索
compareGoods:query=>{return apiClient.post('/goods/compare',{query});},// 按名称搜索商品
searchGoodsByName:query=>{return apiClient.get("/goods/searchByName?query=".concat(encodeURIComponent(query)));},// 获取商品详情
getGoodsDetail:goodsId=>{return apiClient.get("/goods/detail?goodsId=".concat(goodsId));},// 获取所有商品（分页）
getAllGoods:function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let size=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:20;return apiClient.post('/goods/pageAll',{pageNum:page,pageSize:size});},// 新增商品并返回
addAndReturn:data=>{return apiClient.post('/goods/addAndReturn',data);},// 获取本地商品（支持动态属性筛选）
getGoodsPage:function(query,attrFilters,catId){let page=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:1;let size=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:20;let minPrice=arguments.length>5?arguments[5]:undefined;let maxPrice=arguments.length>6?arguments[6]:undefined;let mallTypes=arguments.length>7?arguments[7]:undefined;return apiClient.post('/goods/page',{query,attrFilters,catId,pageNum:page,pageSize:size,minPrice,maxPrice,mallTypes});},// 获取我的收藏
getMyCollect:function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let size=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:20;return apiClient.post('/goods/myCollect',{pageNum:page,pageSize:size});},// 获取我的商品
getMyGoods:function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let size=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:20;return apiClient.post('/goods/myGoods',{pageNum:page,pageSize:size});}};export const categoryApi={getAttributes:catId=>{return apiClient.get("/category/attributes?catId=".concat(catId));},getList:()=>{return apiClient.post('/category/list');}};export const disclosureApi={// 新增爆料 (Add new disclosure)
add:data=>{return apiClient.post('/disclosure/add',data);},// 我的爆料 (My disclosures)
getMyDisclosure:function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let size=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:20;return apiClient.post('/disclosure/queryMyDisclosure',{pageNum:page,pageSize:size});},// 公开爆料 (Public disclosures)
getPublicDisclosure:function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let size=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:20;return apiClient.post('/disclosure/queryPublicList',{pageNum:page,pageSize:size});},// 审核爆料 (Audit)
audit:(disclosureId,status)=>{return apiClient.post('/disclosure/audit',{disclosureId,status});},// 待审核爆料列表 (Admin pending)
getPendingDisclosure:function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let size=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:20;return apiClient.post('/disclosure/queryPendingList',{pageNum:page,pageSize:size});}};export const userApi={// 获取浏览历史
getHistory:function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let size=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:20;return apiClient.post('/user/queryHistory',{pageNum:page,pageSize:size});},// 记录浏览历史
addHistory:goodsId=>{return apiClient.post('/user/addHistory',{goodsId});},// 清空浏览历史
clearHistory:()=>{return apiClient.post('/user/clearHistory');},// 删除单条浏览历史
deleteHistory:goodsId=>{return apiClient.post('/user/deleteHistory',{goodsId});},getProfile:()=>{return apiClient.post('/user/me');},getMetrics:()=>{return apiClient.post('/user/metrics');}};// 商品点赞/收藏相关
export const goodsOperateApi={like:goodsId=>{return apiClient.post('/goods/like',{goodsId});},dislike:goodsId=>{return apiClient.post('/goods/dislike',{goodsId});},collect:goodsId=>{return apiClient.post('/goods/collect',{goodsId});},cancelCollect:goodsId=>{return apiClient.post('/goods/cancelCollect',{goodsId});}};// 爆料点赞/收藏相关
export const disclosureOperateApi={like:disclosureId=>{return apiClient.post('/disclosure/like',{disclosureId});},unlike:disclosureId=>{return apiClient.post('/disclosure/unlike',{disclosureId});},collect:disclosureId=>{return apiClient.post('/disclosure/collect',{disclosureId});},uncollect:disclosureId=>{return apiClient.post('/disclosure/uncollect',{disclosureId});}};export default apiClient;
